english.segment1: LED LIKE A LAMB TO THE SLAUGHTER. In silence and shame, There on Your back You carried a world. Of violence and pain. Bleeding, dying, bleeding, dying.
english.segment2: You're alive, You're alive, You have risen, Alleluia!. And the power and the glory is given, Alleluia, Jesus, to You.
english.segment3: At break of dawn, poor Mary, Still weeping she came, When through her grief she heard Yourvoice. Now speaking her name. Mary, Master, Mary, Master!
english.segment4: At the right hand of the Father. Now seated on high. You have begun Your eternal reign. Of justice and joy. Glory, glory, glory, glory.
english.segment5: Graham Kendrick. Copyright Â© 1983 Thankyou Music
